name: Zero
description: $ZERO is a community-driven, experimental new token launch mechanism and memecoin, launched natively on the Berachain network. Designed as a social and economic experiment, $ZERO embraces a radically fair and transparent launch: no presale, no team allocation, no airdrop, and no expectation of future value. Instead, it is powered entirely by narrative, meme culture, and the collective behavior of its holders.
